name: Farid Aybak
story: Abdul-Qadir Habibi comes from a family of warriors in Iran. Having grown up learning the ways of the military, Abdul-Qadir enlisted and worked his way up to the rank of Corporal. He is a dedicated and disciplined Missile Specialist and is respected by his peers. Despite his intense devotion to his country and cause, Abdul-Qadir is always on the lookout for opportunities to improve peace in the region for his children and future generations.
